metaInfo.realizedTypes:
<entityStoreData> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" abstract="true" extends="Entity" name="RootChild"/> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" abstract="true" extends="RootChild" name="LoadableModule"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="2"/> <constant name="loadorder" type="integer" value="1000000"/> <field cardinality="?" name="classloader" type="^ClassLoader"/>
</entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" abstract="true" extends="LoadableModule" name="NamedLoadableModule"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="0"/> <field cardinality="1" isKey="true" name="name" type="string"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="NamedLoadableModule" name="Certificates"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="1"/> <constant name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.store.cert.CertStore"/> <constant name="loadorder" type="integer" value="150"/> <componentType cardinality="*" name="Certificate"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="RootChild" name="ESConfiguration"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="30"/> <!-- Give this singleton a key. --> <field isKey="true" name="name" type="string"/> <!-- We use this field to verify that the passphrase for the encryped data is synchronized between the server and client, and between multiple invocations of the client --> <field name="passphraseTest" type="encrypted"/> <field name="version" type="string"/> <!-- The product key should never change for the lifetime of the product --> <field name="productKey" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="gitrev" type="string"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="RootChild" name="CircuitContainer"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="1"/> <componentType cardinality="*" name="FilterCircuit"/> <componentType cardinality="*" name="CircuitContainer"/> <componentType cardinality="*" name="MVProperty"/> <field isKey="true" name="name" type="string"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="RootChild" name="FilterCircuit"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="4"/> <componentType cardinality="*" name="Filter"/> <componentType cardinality="1" name="BoundCircuit"/> <componentType cardinality="*" name="Property"/> <field cardinality="1" name="start" type="@Filter"/> <field cardinality="?" name="fault" type="@Filter"/> <field isKey="true" name="name" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="3" name="logMask" type="integer"/>
<field cardinality="?" name="description" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" name="category" type="@PolicyCategory"> <defaultRef> <key type="PolicyCategoryGroup"> <id field="name" value="Policy Categories"/> <key type="PolicyCategory"> <id field="name" value="miscellaneous"/> </key> </key> </defaultRef> </field> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="Entity" name="Certificate"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="6"/> <field isKey="true" name="dname" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="issuer" type="^Certificate"/> <field cardinality="1" name="content" type="binary"/>
<!-- One of key or keyId should be specified: if "engine" is "RAW" (or absent), then "key" contains the encrypted base64 encoded PKCS8 key. Otherwise, keyId specifies an ID for a key as stored on a HSM engine identified by "engine". The meaning and interpretation of keyId is completely at the discretion of the engine: it will be loaded via ENGINE_load_private_key() -->
<field cardinality="?" name="key" type="encrypted"/> <field cardinality="?" name="engine" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="keyId" type="string"/>
<!-- conversation in engine to use when asked for input... --> <field cardinality="?" name="conversation" type="string"/>
<field cardinality="?" name="certificateRealm" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="LOCAL" name="storeType" type="string"/>
</entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" abstract="true" extends="Entity" name="Filter"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="5"/> <field cardinality="?" name="successNode" type="@Filter"/> <field cardinality="?" name="failureNode" type="@Filter"/> <field isKey="true" name="name" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="2" name="logMask" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="1" default="Filter aborted due to exception" name="logFatal" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="Filter failed" name="logFailure" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="Filter passed" name="logSuccess" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" name="category" type="@Category"> <defaultRef> <key type="CategoryGroup"> <id field="name" value="Filter Categories"/> <key type="Category"> <id field="name" value="miscellaneous"/> </key> </key> </defaultRef> </field> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="abortProcessingOnLogError" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="SERVICE" name="logMaskType" type="string"/> <field cardinality="*" name="classloader" type="^ClassLoader"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="Filter" name="TrueFilter"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="0"/> <constant name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.circuit.basic.True"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="Filter" name="SelectorFilter"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="1"/> <constant name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.circuit.basic.SelectorFilter"/> <field cardinality="1" default="${1 + 1 == 2}" name="expression" type="string"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="Filter" name="JWSGeneratorFilter"> <constant name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.circuit.ext.filter.quick.QuickJavaFilter"/> <constant name="_version" type="string" value="1"/> <constant name="displayName" type="string" value="Generate Json Web Signature"/> <constant name="description" type="string" value="Generate a signed JWT or JWS object"/> <constant name="icon" type="string" value="xmlsig"/> <constant name="palette" type="string" value="Integrity"/> <constant name="required" type="string" value="http.headers,content.body"/> <constant name="resources" type="string" value="#Thu Apr 02 10:52:16 CEST 2020
SIGNATURE_ADVANCED_TAB=Advanced (JWS/JWT)
CLAIM_OIDCH_LABEL=Authorization Code (generate 'c_hash' half hash)
SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMFIXED=Manually specify algorithm
OUTPUT_ATTRIBUTENAME_LABEL=Attribute name
CLAIM_OIDATH_LABEL=Access Token (generate 'at_hash' half hash)
SIGNATURE_OUTPUT_TAB=Signature Output
FILTER_DISPLAYNAME=Generate Json Web Signature
CLAIM_EXP_LABEL=Delay before expiration 'exp' (relative to 'nbf')
SIGNATURE_JWSPAYLOAD_TAB=Signature Payload
CLAIM_AUD_LABEL=Audience 'aud'
SIGNATURE_KEYSELECTOR=Use Selector expression
CLAIM_CRIT_LABEL=Critical extensions 'crit'
CLAIM_JWK_LABEL=Embed all key related claims in the 'jwk' claim (except for 'jku')
CLAIM_DEF_LABEL=Deflate body before signing (non standard)
SIGNATURE_OUTATTRIBUTE=Set an attribute with the generated signature
CLAIM_NBF_LABEL=Delay before usage 'nbf' (relative to system time)
CLAIM_JKU_LABEL=JWK Set URL
SIGNATURE_JWTTEMPLATE_LABEL=JSON Template
SIGNATURE_ALGORITHM_GROUP=Algorithm selection
SIGNATURE_CERTIFICATE_LABEL=Signer Certificate
SIGNATURE_JWTCLAIMS_LABEL=JWT Claims
SIGNATURE_PRIVATEKEY_LABEL=External Certificate Private Key
CLAIMS_AUD_LABEL=Alternate JWT Audiences
FILTER_CATEGORY=Integrity
OUTPUT_HEADERS_BODY=Use body headers
SIGNATURE_KEYCHAIN_LABEL=External Certificate Chain
SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMLEVEL_LABEL=Discover algorithm level (256, 384 or 512)
CLAIM_X5C_LABEL=Include 'x5c' certificate chain
CLAIM_ISS_LABEL=Issuer 'iss'
CLAIM_X5U_LABEL=Include 'x5u' certificate URL
CLAIM_X5T_LABEL=Generate 'x5t' thumbprint
CLAIM_KID_LABEL=Include 'kid' claim if a key ID is available
SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMFIXED_LABEL=Algorithm
QUICKFILTER_REQUIRED=http.headers,content.body
SIGNATURE_JWSHEADER_TAB=Signature JOSE Header
OUTPUT_HEADER_OVERWRITE=Overwrite existing value
SIGNATURE_KEYID_X5T256=Compute Certificate x5t\#256
SIGNATURE_KEY_GROUP=Key Selection
CLAIM_TYP_LABEL=Generate 'typ' claim
SIGNATURE_OUTBODY=Set the generated signature as body
SIGNATURE_OPENID_GROUP=OpenID Special claims
SIGNATURE_JWSCERTIFICATE_GROUP=Certificate specific header claims
SIGNATURE_ALGORITHM_TAB=Signature Key and Algorithm
FILTER_DESCRIPTION=Generate a signed JWT or JWS object
SIGNATURE_KEYSELECTOR_LABEL=Key
SIGNATURE_OUTHEADER=Add the generated signature to an HTTP header
CLAIM_X5T256_LABEL=Generate 'x5t\#256' thumbprint
JWSEXTENSIONPOLICY_TITLE=Select a policy to extend the JWS Header
OUTPUT_HEADERNAME_LABEL=Header name
JWSPAYLOAD_LIFETIME_GROUP=JWS lifetime offsets (in seconds)
SIGNATURE_KEYID_X5T=Compute Certificate x5t
OUTPUT_HEADERS_MESSAGE=Use message headers
JWTEXTENSIONPOLICY_TITLE=Select a policy to extend the JWT Payload
FILTER_ICON=xmlsig
SIGNATURE_KEYID_ALIAS=Use Certificate Alias
SIGNATURE_JWT=Generate JWT
CLAIM_SUB_LABEL=Subject 'sub'
SIGNATURE_JWS=Generate JWS from existing body
SIGNATURE_KEYID_LABEL=Signature KeyId Generation
SIGNATURE_KEYSELECTORID_LABEL=Key ID
JWSEXTENSIONPOLICY_LABEL=Extend JWS Header using a Policy
CLAIM_JTI_LABEL=ID 'jti'
JWTEXTENSIONPOLICY_LABEL=Extend JWT Payload using a Policy
SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMLEVEL=Discover algorithm from key
CLAIM_CTY_LABEL=Generate 'cty' claim (forced for nested JWT/JWS)
SIGNATURE_KEYINSTORE=Use Key from internal key store
CLAIM_IAT_LABEL=Include system time 'iat'
"/> <constant name="ui" type="string" value="<ui>
	<panel columns="2" span="2" fill="true">
		<panel columns="2">
			<!-- filter name attribute -->
			<NameAttribute/>
		</panel>

		<panel columns="2" span="2">
			<tabFolder span="2">
				<tab label="SIGNATURE_ALGORITHM_TAB">
					<panel columns="2" span="2" fill="false">
						<group label="SIGNATURE_ALGORITHM_GROUP" span="2">
							<RadioGroupAttribute field="signatureAlgorithmType" columns="2">
								<choice span="2" value="0" label="SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMLEVEL"/>
								<panel columns="2" span="2">
									<TextAttribute field="signatureAlgorithmLevel" label="SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMLEVEL_LABEL"/>
								</panel>
								<choice span="2" value="1" label="SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMFIXED"/>
								<panel columns="2" span="2">
									<TextAttribute field="signatureAlgorithmFixed" label="SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMFIXED_LABEL"/>
								</panel>
							</RadioGroupAttribute>
						</group>

						<group label="SIGNATURE_KEY_GROUP" span="2">
							<RadioGroupAttribute field="signatureKeyType" columns="2">
								<choice span="2" value="0" label="SIGNATURE_KEYINSTORE"/>
								<panel columns="2" span="2">
									<certSelector field="signatureCertificate" label="SIGNATURE_CERTIFICATE_LABEL" view="privateKey"/>
									<group label="SIGNATURE_KEYID_LABEL" columns="2" span="2">
										<panel span="2">
											<RadioGroupAttribute field="signatureKeyId" columns="2">
												<choice span="2" value="0" label="SIGNATURE_KEYID_ALIAS"/>
												<choice span="2" value="1" label="SIGNATURE_KEYID_X5T"/>
												<choice span="2" value="2" label="SIGNATURE_KEYID_X5T256"/>
											</RadioGroupAttribute>
										</panel>
									</group>
								</panel>
								<choice span="2" value="1" label="SIGNATURE_KEYSELECTOR"/>
								<panel columns="2" span="2">
									<TextAttribute field="signatureKeySelector" label="SIGNATURE_KEYSELECTOR_LABEL"/>
									<TextAttribute field="signatureKeyIdSelector" label="SIGNATURE_KEYSELECTORID_LABEL"/>
								</panel>
							</RadioGroupAttribute>
						</group>
					</panel>
				</tab>
				<tab label="SIGNATURE_JWSHEADER_TAB">
					<panel columns="2" span="2" fill="false">
						<ButtonAttribute field="generateTYP" label="CLAIM_TYP_LABEL" span="2"/>
						<ButtonAttribute field="generateKID" label="CLAIM_KID_LABEL" span="2"/>
						<TextAttribute field="generateJKU" label="CLAIM_JKU_LABEL" required="false"/>
						<group label="SIGNATURE_JWSCERTIFICATE_GROUP" columns="2" span="2">
							<ButtonAttribute field="generateJWK" label="CLAIM_JWK_LABEL" span="2"/>
							<ButtonAttribute field="generateX5T" label="CLAIM_X5T_LABEL" span="2"/>
							<ButtonAttribute field="generateX5T256" label="CLAIM_X5T256_LABEL" span="2"/>
							<ButtonAttribute field="generateX5C" label="CLAIM_X5C_LABEL" span="2"/>
							<TextAttribute field="generateX5U" label="CLAIM_X5U_LABEL" required="false"/>
						</group>
					</panel>
				</tab>
				<tab label="SIGNATURE_JWSPAYLOAD_TAB">
					<panel columns="2" span="2" fill="false">
						<RadioGroupAttribute field="signaturePayloadType" columns="2" span="2">
							<choice span="2" value="0" label="SIGNATURE_JWS"/>
							<panel columns="2" span="2">
								<ButtonAttribute field="generateCTY" label="CLAIM_CTY_LABEL" span="2"/>
								<ButtonAttribute field="deflatePayload" label="CLAIM_DEF_LABEL" span="2"/>
							</panel>
							<choice span="2" value="1" label="SIGNATURE_JWT"/>
							<scrollpanel>
								<panel columns="2" span="2">
									<panel columns="2" span="2">
										<TextAttribute label="SIGNATURE_JWTTEMPLATE_LABEL" field="signaturePayloadSelector"/>
										<TextAttribute field="generateISS" label="CLAIM_ISS_LABEL" required="false"/>
										<TextAttribute field="generateSUB" label="CLAIM_SUB_LABEL" required="false"/>
										<TextAttribute field="generateJTI" label="CLAIM_JTI_LABEL" required="false"/>
										<TextAttribute field="generateAUD" label="CLAIM_AUD_LABEL" required="false"/>
									</panel>
									<group label="JWSPAYLOAD_LIFETIME_GROUP" columns="2" span="2">
										<panel columns="2" span="2">
											<TextAttribute field="generateNBF" label="CLAIM_NBF_LABEL" required="false"/>
											<TextAttribute field="generateEXP" label="CLAIM_EXP_LABEL" required="false"/>
											<ButtonAttribute field="generateIAT" label="CLAIM_IAT_LABEL" span="2"/>
										</panel>
									</group>
									<group label="SIGNATURE_OPENID_GROUP" columns="2" span="2">
										<panel columns="2" span="2">
											<TextAttribute field="generateOIDATH" label="CLAIM_OIDATH_LABEL" required="false"/>
											<TextAttribute field="generateOIDCH" label="CLAIM_OIDCH_LABEL" required="false"/>
										</panel>
									</group>
								</panel>
							</scrollpanel>
						</RadioGroupAttribute>
					</panel>
				</tab>
				<tab label="SIGNATURE_ADVANCED_TAB">
					<panel columns="2" span="2" fill="false">
						<FieldTable field="headerExtensions" label="CLAIM_CRIT_LABEL"/>
						<FieldTable field="payloadAudiences" label="CLAIMS_AUD_LABEL"/>
						<TextAttribute field="signaturePrivateKeySelector" label="SIGNATURE_PRIVATEKEY_LABEL"/>
						<TextAttribute field="signatureKeyChainSelector" label="SIGNATURE_KEYCHAIN_LABEL"/>
						<ReferenceSelector field="headerExtensionCircuit" selectableTypes="FilterCircuit" searches="ROOT_CIRCUIT_CONTAINER,CircuitContainer" label="JWSEXTENSIONPOLICY_LABEL" title="JWSEXTENSIONPOLICY_TITLE"/>
						<ReferenceSelector field="payloadExtensionCircuit" selectableTypes="FilterCircuit" searches="ROOT_CIRCUIT_CONTAINER,CircuitContainer" label="JWTEXTENSIONPOLICY_LABEL" title="JWTEXTENSIONPOLICY_TITLE"/>
					</panel>
				</tab>
				<tab label="SIGNATURE_OUTPUT_TAB">
					<panel columns="2" span="2" fill="false">
						<ButtonAttribute field="signatureOutputBody" label="SIGNATURE_OUTBODY" span="2"/>
						<ButtonAttribute field="signatureOutputAttribute" label="SIGNATURE_OUTATTRIBUTE" span="2"/>
						<panel columns="2" span="2" label="SIGNATURE_OUTATTRIBUTE_PANEL">
							<MsgAttrAttribute field="signatureOutputAttributeName" label="OUTPUT_ATTRIBUTENAME_LABEL"/>
						</panel>
						<ButtonAttribute field="signatureOutputHeader" label="SIGNATURE_OUTHEADER" span="2"/>
						<panel columns="2" span="2" label="SIGNATURE_OUTHEADER_PANEL">
							<TextAttribute field="signatureOutputHeaderName" label="OUTPUT_HEADERNAME_LABEL" required="false"/>
							<ButtonAttribute field="overwriteExistingHeader" label="OUTPUT_HEADER_OVERWRITE" span="2"/>
							<panel columns="1" span="2">
								<RadioGroupAttribute field="signatureOutputHeaderLocation" columns="2">
									<choice value="body" label="OUTPUT_HEADERS_BODY"/>
									<choice value="httpheaders" label="OUTPUT_HEADERS_MESSAGE"/>
								</RadioGroupAttribute>
							</panel>
						</panel>
						<binding driver="SIGNATURE_OUTATTRIBUTE" driven="SIGNATURE_OUTATTRIBUTE_PANEL" class="com.vordel.client.ui.declarative.Enabler"/>
						<binding driver="SIGNATURE_OUTHEADER" driven="SIGNATURE_OUTHEADER_PANEL" class="com.vordel.client.ui.declarative.Enabler"/>
					</panel>
				</tab>
			</tabFolder>
		</panel>
	</panel>
</ui>"/> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="1"/> <field cardinality="?" name="generateNBF" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="signatureOutputHeader" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" name="generateAUD" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="signatureCertificate" type="^Certificate"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${signer.key.chain}" name="signatureKeyChainSelector" type="string"/> <field cardinality="*" name="payloadAudiences" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="generateCTY" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="jwt.body" name="signatureOutputAttributeName" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${openid.accesstoken}" name="generateOIDATH" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${id}" name="generateJTI" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${signer.private.key}" name="signaturePrivateKeySelector" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="signatureOutputHeaderName" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="generateX5C" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" name="headerExtensionCircuit" type="^FilterCircuit"/> <field cardinality="?" name="generateEXP" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="signatureKeyType" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${signer.keyId}" name="signatureKeyIdSelector" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="1" name="generateIAT" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${openid.code}" name="generateOIDCH" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="256" name="signatureAlgorithmLevel" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="signatureOutputBody" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${jwkset.url}" name="generateJKU" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${http.request.url}" name="generateISS" type="string"/> <field cardinality="*" name="headerExtensions" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="1" name="signatureOutputAttribute" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="httpheaders" name="signatureOutputHeaderLocation" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="deflatePayload" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="generateTYP" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="1" name="overwriteExistingHeader" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="signatureKeyId" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="signatureAlgorithmType" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${authentication.subject.id}" name="generateSUB" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${signer.key}" name="signatureKeySelector" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="generateKID" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" name="signatureAlgorithmFixed" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${certificate.rfc5080.url}" name="generateX5U" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="payloadExtensionCircuit" type="^FilterCircuit"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="generateX5T" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="signaturePayloadType" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="?" default="1" name="generateX5T256" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${content.body}" name="signaturePayloadSelector" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="generateJWK" type="boolean"/></entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="Filter" name="JavaScriptFilter"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="3"/> <constant name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.circuit.script.ScriptFilter"/> <field cardinality="1" default="function invoke(msg) { return true; }" name="script" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="nashorn" name="engineName" type="string"/> <field cardinality="*" name="requiredProperties" type="string"/> <field cardinality="*" name="generatedProperties" type="string"/> <field cardinality="*" name="consumedProperties" type="string"/> </entityType> </entityStoreData>

id.value: Evaluate Selector : is Token Exchange Flow

fval.name: logFatal
fval.value: Error while attempt to run script filter. Error: ${circuit.exception}

fval.name: script
name
fval.value: Generate Json Web Signature : Generate Token replacement value

fval.name: name
fval.value: Evaluate Selector : is Token Exchange Flow

id.value: Generate Json Web Signature : Generate Token replacement value
